body.name: EppieBasic Led Desk Lamp, Architect Desk Lamps for Home Office, 12W Dimmable & 6 Color Modes Extra Bright Modern Table lamp with Base, Auto Dimming Overhead Desk Lighting for Workbench Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 18 hrs 59 mins
features: 🌟【Ultra Bright & Wide Illumination】With sleek and minimalist design, Eppiebasic office table lamp has a 18-inch wide LED head for full desk coverage evenly, and 700LM energy-saving desk lamp supplies 80W incandescent bulb equivalent light illuminating the entire desk workbench evenly. Highly efficient LEDs provide 12W enough brightness while consuming 80% less energy and will last for 50,000 hours.

🌟【Stepless Dimming & 6 Color Modes】Featuring easy-to-control touch buttons, it is easy-peasy to dim and adjust color temperature from 3000K to 6000K, making it a more eye-friendly options. This desk light can give a more comfortable environment for your eyes and illuminate everything on your desk, ideal for studio, monitor, drawing, sewing, crafting, painting, reading.

🌟【No Flickering, Eye-Care Office Lamp】The 45° angled away LEDs Design keeps the light from entering your face and eyes. The light source (RA>90) offers fully diffused lighting and a comfortable light without flickering, ghost-freeze. It can help you better see what you’re working on at hand, reducing eye fatigue, also help set the right mood for getting work done.

🌟【Highly Flexible Neck & Sturdy Base】It features a rotatable and bendable long neck that allows you to spotlight your work at the perfect angle. This bright desk lamp comes with a compact and metal sturdy base that makes it fit easily in any space, so you can even use it for your bookshelves or bedside table too. The office desk lamp supports the monitors size up to 32-Inch (Max working height 20.8-inch).

🌟【Auto Dimming Mode& Memory Function】One-step to turn on the auto dimming mode if you don’t want to adjust the brightness, it will detect the room light and adjust accordingly. Memory function will restore your last setting. 1-Years of Warranty: replacement for any quality issues with 24/7 Customer Service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy lamp for various lighting needs
reviews.reviewText: I needed a simple lamp with a long enough neck to reach over my computer monitors. Most of the desk lamps I came across were too short or the longer “gooseneck” lamps required mounting to the desk, which would not work for me as my desk has a hutch. The base is heavy-duty enough that there is virtually no chance of the lamp tipping, which I really appreciate. The dynamic lighting adjustments offered with brightness and color are really nice. I didn’t need or want an overly bright light so I keep the brightness almost to the minimum setting and the color somewhere in between cool and warm. The pictures I took actually make it appear as though I have the brightness turned up, but that is not so. As you can see though, it’s a perfect fit and illuminates my work area sufficiently.For the price, I find this to be a decent quality lamp. As long as it continues to function properly, my 5 star rating stands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've had this desk lamp for 3 months now
reviews.reviewText: The desk lamp is set up behind the computer display/TV. The business end sits above and in front of the display. It's out of the way and pretty unobtrusive. My office is a small room with small furniture and all the desk space is necessary for things other than the lamp. All it takes is a touch to turn on, or dim, or change the quality of the light. When it's bright, it's very, very bright. So glad I found it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome High Quality Lamp
reviews.reviewText: There are similar lamps for half the price, but this lamp is so well made that it's more than worth it. Fit and finish is impeccable and the goose neck looks like it was made that way no matter how you position it. The light quality is FANTASTIC.Assembly was easy, and it's like they already knew I would spend an hour looking for a screwdriver, so they included one. They also seem to know that there was a 90% likelihood that I would lose a screw, so, yup, there is an extra one. I will probably unscrew each screw and replace it with a drop of blue thread locker.The only negative is that it was shipped in an unsealed box. Outside of that it is very well packaged with lots of protective foam.Overall I'm very impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright
reviews.reviewText: It is nice and bright for me to see when I'm cutting my material or putting blocks together. The on/off button stopped working the 2nd day I had it so now I just unplug it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very responsive company and great lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for my needs. It is adjustable in light temperature and brightness. The brightest level is very bright, perfect for working on my drawings and art. I am on my second lamp. The first one worked perfectly for about 4 months, and then the on/off switch stopped working. When I contacted the company they sent me a replacement lamp immediately! The replacement is working perfectly. I highly recommend this lamp and this company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't know why I did not buy this sooner
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this item and I wish I had bought this earlier. As I am working from home, I have to either sit in a dark room or turn on the room lights at night. Since I do not have curtains and have windows on two sides of the room, I have been hesitating about turning the lights on which would expose the entire room to all the neighbors. So finally I decided to get a desk lamp (that I have never heard of before) because of my friend's recommendation. Now, I can use my laptop with enough light while the room is very dark and I am probably not very visible either.The packaging is wonderful, all parts are secure with foams inside the box. The assembly took about 1-2 minutes and I did not even need to look at the manual. It comes with all you need: 4 screws and a screwdriver. I love it when manufacturers think about customers and put everything inside the package. It has a durable silicone neck that you can adjust the lamp bar with. The lamp bar has 4 switches: ON/OFF, auto-adjustment mode, color temperature, and brightness settings. The base is very stable with 4 stoppers at the bottom. Even the lowest brightness provides enough light for reading. This is an absolute game-changer. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this about a month ago for my office at work. I needed something to help brighten an area that the overhead lights left dim.This light was pretty easy to assemble by myself and came with the necessary tools. The light can be adjusted to direct the light where needed and is sturdy and not prone to tipping over since the bottom is weighted providing stability.I’m very happy with my light!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good lamp/great support
reviews.reviewText: Great lamp for us WFH types. I have mine between my two monitors, provides good light spread and brightness. Great support- After about six months one of the buttons stopped working, contacted customer support and they sent a new one out; delivered within a week.
Es una lámpara muy buena, ilumina de manera espectacular, y tienes varios tipos de luz junto con la intensidad, excelente producto.

reviews.reviewTitle: No ilumina bien para ser una lámpara tan grande y para su costo elevado
reviews.reviewText: No ilumina bien para ser una lámpara tan grande y para su costo elevado

The lamp is we’ll built and feels solid to the touch. It has many brightness settings and different types of light quality which makes it suitable for many users. It is easy to setup and it doesn’t produce much heat with prolonged usage. The down side I can mention is the long frame which may be difficult to use if your desk space is limited or you have a shelf above the desk. Overall it is good value for money.

Over the past few years I have tried many desk lamps for my home office. This white LED desk lamp takes the cake. Here are my pro’s to the product:First I will mention that shipping was fast. It came in a nice sturdy package. It was very easy to install. Secondly, I would like to mention that it is a overhead desk lamp so it is perfect lighting for your computer screen but does not glare into your eyes. It also takes up the least amount of valuable real estate on your desk. The light is flexible, and you can change the light mode to warm or cool lighting depending on your preference. I liked it so much that I purchased 3 of these desk lamps.Are they expensive? Yes that is the only con that I can say about this desk lamp. It is quite pricey for a desk lamp but if you think about it, you use it all the time when you are sitting at your desk. So it is worthwhile to invest in a good lighting to avoid straining your eyes.Do I recommend it? Absolutely 100%!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good lamp (but wrong mains plug for Australia!)
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the lamp's function and design, it does what I want...but it's not cheap, especially if you are on a budget.My only gripe is that the lamp was supplied with a mains plug for USA(?). Why would an item be offered on amazon.com.au (Australia) for supply to Australia and the description NOT mention this important fact?! Inexcusable laziness or indifference by the seller and it meant that I had to buy an adapter before I could use the lamp.(I found the lamp was much easier to use when seated after I stuck labels on the lamp's top bar showing the location of each out-of-sight touch button. That might sound anal but it saves me having to get up from the chair each time to see where a button is to make an adjustment to the lighting).
